data.text: @__Granuaile__ @calirunnerdoc I’m sorry to hear that, but glad you’re getting help now! 🤗
@__Granuaile__ @calirunnerdoc Are you in the States? We don’t get tests like that in the UK. My neurologist wrote one word - “depression” - as a comment on my MRI in 2021. Wishing you all the best.
@__Granuaile__ @calirunnerdoc Sorry to hear this. Dreading my next MRI. Hug

@calirunnerdoc 25 months of Long Covid - MRI this week showed I have cortical based gliosis & volume loss in the R parietal lobe & white matter hyperintensities in L peritrigonal region & subcortical left superior frontal gyrus.
These lesions are like those with Alzheimers or MS.  I'm 43.
@calirunnerdoc I am so, so sad this has happened to you.
@STEFNOMAD @cncrndctz3n @martabeattie @calirunnerdoc Hahaha ok whatever you say. I’m pretty low energy, and I’m not wasting it arguing with someone who’s spare parts.

@thatprincesong @VioletEglantine @bitcoinbender81 @calirunnerdoc If I was going to this extreme, I'd get one that protects eyes like my son does in his shop, 3M Ultimate FX Full Facepiece Reusable Respirator FF-402.
https://t.co/Hx1sjEQvWo
For those who need clarification about the brain damage COVID can cause, and need a “before and after,”please review the following study: https://t.co/yxDDpwTaP9
